pageContent: Background: Some men with localized radio-recurrent prostate cancer may benefit from salvage high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU). Herein, we describe oncologic outcomes and predictors of disease response after salvage whole gland HIFU from our prospective cohort.

metaData.source:
Eight years' experience with high-intensity focused ultrasonography for treatment of localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18829078/
